name: marco-portfolio
description: Portfolio personal de Marco David Toledo Canna - Full Stack Developer

scripts.build: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp *.html *.css *.js *.txt *.xml public/ && cp assets/* public/ && sed -i 's|src="assets/|src="/|g' public/*.html && sed -i 's|href="assets/|href="/|g' public/*.html

author: Marco David Toledo Canna
